value.0: Si, of course
Ahh... Ai am a master of anytink intellectualizone and artizinale! Ai am dee best painter, and dee best inventor, and dee best drawer, and now I am goink to be dee best researcher!
Si, I search for Re! I found Ankh and Mun, but Re keeps eludink me, maledicalo!
Becauzze I found Ankh and Mun, stupido! Ai must find Re or my honore as a genioos can go into dee Insalata Caprese! Ai must succeedo or ai will go back to mannink dee gondolas like my fratelli!
Esta ees Ankh-Re-Mun, a regione of previouzzely unknown locazione.

Si! I was forced to run into dee montes from dee horrissima undead in ghere, and then I made dee ultimo discovery! Dees ees not an isolated bambino village, but dee center of a grandissimo island: Khem!
I deed dee triangulari con milanese and questioned dee natives and then I found eet! Eets in dee Alambar Sea, dee mare separating Thay, Unther, and Mulhorand.
Si! Esta was drivink me MAD! I was keep thinkink "Ees eet on dee plana materiazole, or ees eet sometink or someghere else?".
Eet ees cloze! We found dee old templi of dee old Gods! Ghorus-Re, Isis, zey are all dere!
Stupido! Were ees dee beach and dee mare? You see dee pesci ghere or dee ragazzi swimmink?
Stop kiddink me!
Argghh... merda del toro! A bambino can see that dees ees not a pico de montana!
Huh? O... ghave we met already?
Ai am Leonardo and ai am a genioos!
What makes you a genius?
Researcher?
Why do you want to find Re?
I wish you good luck with that. Can I ask another question?
What is this place?
How nice. Can I ask another question?
So.. know you know where it is?
And where may this island be located?
Who cares? Where's the loot?
So that's where we were all the time... interesting! Thanks, Leo.
Unknown location?
Bye bye, Leonardo.
I am afraid I don't have a clue either. Can I ask another question?
Seems like Mulhorand to me?
I think it's an island somewhere in the Sea of Swords
Well... I found this shipwreck...
It's on the top of the Skull Crags?
O... sorry. Can I ask another question?
O, I mistook you for somebody else. Goodbye!
Yes, you are Leonardo, the residental genius. Can I ask you a few questions?
No, I don't think so. Who are you?
Ahhh... I am <FirstName>, well met. Can I ask you some questions?
